article: I graduated from a small public school in Michigan. One day,Mr. Ledy,our football coach,asked me to play football. I couldn't help _ :me,play football? I was six feet tall and was not much _ a hundred pounds in weight. I thought that they might just need _ fool to increase the number of the players. However,he was persistent and _ I joined the football team. That turned out to be one of my best decisions as a kid. Our worst game _ was the one against Crystal Falls. They beat us 56 to 6. Yeah! That was a football not a basketball _ . We played them again when we were seniors. They _ us again but the score was much more _ ,30 to 20. Coach Ledy would not let that _ again. He encouraged us to beat them,to pay them back. And we did so in the last game we played before _ . I had scored 6 points alone in the game. Coach Ledy praised me. It was a huge _ for me. Was I a football hero? Ha! Ha! No,I couldn't _ it without our team. The thing I learned through football was _ . We won as a team and we _ as a team. I think Mr. Ledy would be _ of me if he knew that I had broken the athletic _ at the University of Michigan. I'm _ to him as I would not have today's honor without him. I'll _ life's final war with pain to win the victory;I'll seek the lights of glory wholeheartedly and I'll keep on working hard so as not to let him down.
